item.title: Samsung Omnia Smarthone Overview
item.description: The Samsung pulled out a heavyweight final 12 months once they revealed the Omnia, which has reportedly seen good gross sales via the 12 months [...]
item.content:encoded:
The Samsung pulled out a heavyweight final 12 months once they revealed the Omnia, which has reportedly seen good gross sales via the 12 months and hit prime spot in Krusell’s listing for prime 10 promoting telephones in November 2008. Combining excessive efficiency enterprise content material, nice design and wealthy multimedia expertise, the Samsung Omnia is the primary 5 megapixel digicam Home windows Cell smartphone and actually its greatest factors could be its wonderful design and multitude of options.

As talked about, design must be the Omnia’s biggest power. It received a slick platinum entrance, huge and simple to press name buttons, and most of all massive show which is a good bonus when utilizing GPS. The telephone matches proper within the palm of person so the grip feels snug. Plus, the Omnia is slim and light-weight, making it very snug to hold round with out having to really feel a cumbersome bulge in your pockets. General, the Omnia has a really polished look to it and this may actually please customers who go for fashion.

The Samsung Omnia’s different main robust level is it’s many providing in time period of features and options. One of many main options of the Omnia is the 5 megapixel digicam. Not solely does it have flash built-in and auto focus but additionally a “Extensive Dynamic Vary” mode which makes full use of the show of the telephone. As well as, the digicam has features similar to face monitoring, smile detection, digital picture stabilizer, auto-panorama shot and geotagging. The telephone has an inside reminiscence capability of 8GB and as much as 16GB, which will be elevated by way of microSD playing cards (most 16GB) for a complete capability of 32GB.

The Omnia additionally contains a built-in GPS receiver with A-GPS assist and since it’s A-GPS the satellite tv for pc lockdown is quicker than common GPS. Though there isn’t any GPS navigation software program, customers can at all times use the Google Maps software that’s preinstalled. Another main function is the accelerometer. Transferring on, the Samsung Omnia has nice multimedia playback capabilities; it’s the first DivX licensed Home windows Cell PDA so that you get DivX playback proper from the get go. General, multimedia playback was very passable total for each video and audio. Different multimedia options embrace the FM radio and picture browser. Connectivity sensible, the Omnia has the whole lot apart from infrared, which no one makes use of anymore lately.

There may be a lot to speak in regards to the usability, particularly by way of the responsiveness. The Omnia is barely sluggish, which I consider is because of the Widgets which means that eradicating it from the GUI will possible end in a superior telephone. The Omnia additionally would not include a stylus so you need to use the magnetic model between the 2 name buttons. This take a little bit of time getting used to however customers can at all times use their fingers as effectively or higher but if they’ve their very own spare stylus.

The Omnia has its deficiencies and its worth is usually a bit scary, reflecting the premium you must pay, however total the Samsung Omnia is a good telephone. It oozes class and elegance in addition to possessing nice options and functionalities, making it appropriate for each enterprise and leisure.

item.content:encoded:

The sting display screen is certainly handy and intuitive providing an expertise that has not been loved earlier than.

Different options

It has a extremely succesful digital camera providing good vibrant pictures which you could additionally monitor shifting topics and nonetheless have the clearest pictures ever. It has quick charging expertise with ten minutes of cost managing to serve you for at the very least 4 hours.

item.title: iSAFE Backpacks and Baggage – The Solely Backpack With a Constructed In Cellular Private Security Alarm – A Overview
item.description: I’ve been satisfied of the efficacy of non-public safety merchandise since September of 2008 but it surely was solely September of this 12 months (2011) [...]
item.content:encoded:
I’ve been satisfied of the efficacy of non-public safety merchandise since September of 2008 but it surely was solely September of this 12 months (2011) that I turned conscious of the iSAFE Backpacks and Baggage. I used to be truly stunned that I did not consider such a product earlier than. In spite of everything, I do know of a number of private alarms in varied codecs – ones that double as a keychain, others slot in a handbag, some to position on a window or door and plenty of extra. Though these alarms make the required noise to name consideration to 1’s want for assist in a harmful state of affairs and are comparatively cheap, they’re additionally straightforward to depart at dwelling or straightforward to misplace or lose.

The iSAFE bag, then again, is the primary patented backpack and bag with a built-in cell private safety alarm system. With the pull of a twine positioned on the iSafe backpack’s shoulder strap, the consumer can set off two excessive pitched screaming sirens (louder than most automobile alarms) and a high-intensity strobe mild to name consideration to their harmful state of affairs and the necessity for instant assist. To deactivate the alarm merely reinsert the pin. Reflectors on the shoulder strap present night-time visibility for added security.

The baggage are made from very sturdy nylon, are water and shock resistant, have robust zippers that won’t simply injury and open and shut easily. The i SAFE backpacks have a number of sturdy and roomy compartments to retailer every thing youngsters, youngsters, school college students, and adults would possibly wish to carry together with a person compartment for a cellphone or iPod. There’s even sufficient room for a laptop computer laptop.

As well as, the iSAFE backpack is made extra snug to put on by the froth padding and S-shaped shoulder straps which offer good again assist. The adjustable chest strap prevents the backpack from being simply taken away.

The alarm is powered by two 9V batteries and, if wanted, will run constantly for 2 hours. If the consumer turns into misplaced throughout a hike they’ll run the alarm constantly for the 2 hours or change it on and off to preserve battery energy. Nevertheless, due to its electrical elements, the iSafe backpack can’t be submerged in water.

iSafe luggage begin at simply $59.99 and have the identical high quality, options, pockets and sturdiness of main backpack and bag suppliers like Jansport, L.L. Bean, Northface and Targus. iSAFE Backpacks and Messenger luggage can be found in Blue, Black, Pink, Plaid, Geometric, Multicolor, and Brand design materials.

The iSafe backpack is good for youngsters who wish to shield themselves from bullies or predators lurking the streets, hikers who could have to sign for assist, anybody strolling by a darkish parking storage or lot, joggers, accident victims, and anybody else in search of an added sense of safety. As a mum or dad, I positive really feel calmer and safer understanding that my baby takes the iSAFE Backpack each time they depart the home.

One could marvel if these luggage will go airport safety checks. At the moment it’s suggested that the batteries be eliminated earlier than going by safety and permitting a bit of further time on the airport for the safety folks to examine the bag completely.

Should you register your iSafe bag buy on-line or over the cellphone, you may change your backpack for a brand new one for 50% the unique worth. You are able to do this annually, and there’s no restrict to what number of occasions you may change your backpack.
